description: Numbers that are congruent to {0, 1, 3} mod 8.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,1,-1).
formula: Equals partial sums of (0, 1, 2, 5, 1, 2, 5, 1, 2, 5,...). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Jun 19 2008.a(n)=a(n-1)+a(n-3)-a(n-4). G.f.: x^2*(1+2*x+5*x^2)/(1-x-x^3+x^4). [Colin Barker, Jan 26 2012]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
